title: Doubtful
text:
There is something in your eye, right?
That's making you cry tonight?
Hands clasp my heart as I stare at you from across room.
You are happy, right?
Not sad?
You had no idea how you twist the knife in my heart
When you rub salt all over my wounded body…
I hurt.
I know now that my dreams will come true….
Even if it is without you.
Trusting you is something I can't do,
Without my stolen heart.
But you stare at me with desire in your eyes
And I feel loved and wanted.
Why can't I leave you?
